free.musicians: SELECT ?Musician ?Age (group_concat(?SubClass; separator=", ") as ?Type) ?Band WHERE { ?MusicianItem a ?SubClass. ?MusicianItem rdfs:label ?Musician. OPTIONAL { ?MusicianItem musica:et\u00E0 ?Age . } OPTIONAL {?BandItem rdfs:label ?Band. ?BandItem musica:haComponente ?MusicianItem .} FILTER(?SubClass != musica:Musicista && EXISTS{ ?SubClass rdfs:subClassOf musica:Musicista})} group by ?MusicianItem ?Age ?BandItem
free.musicians_only_bands: SELECT ?Musician ?Age ?Band WHERE { ?Band musica:haComponente ?Musician . OPTIONAL {?Musician musica:et\u00E0 ?Age}} ORDER BY ?Band
free.musicians_only_solists: SELECT ?Musician ?Age (group_concat(?SubClass; separator=", ") as ?Type) WHERE { ?Musician a ?SubClass. OPTIONAL { ?Musician musica:et\u00E0 ?Age . } OPTIONAL {?Band musica:haComponente ?Musician .} FILTER(NOT EXISTS { ?Musician musica:componenteDi ?Band } && ?SubClass != musica:Musicista && EXISTS{ ?SubClass rdfs:subClassOf musica:Musicista})} group by ?Musician ?Age
free.albums: SELECT ?Owner ?Album ?Sales ?Certificate ?Out_Date WHERE {{ ?bandItem a musica:Band . ?bandItem musica:bandHaAlbum ?AlbumItem . ?AlbumItem rdfs:label ?Album . ?bandItem rdfs:label ?band . BIND(?band AS ?Owner) OPTIONAL {?CertificateItem rdfs:label ?Certificate . ?AlbumItem musica:haCertificato ?CertificateItem. } { ?AlbumItem musica:numeroVendite ?Sales. } OPTIONAL { ?AlbumItem musica:dataUscita ?Out_Date. } } UNION { ?musicianItem a musica:Musicista . ?AlbumItem rdfs:label ?Album . ?musicianItem musica:haAlbum ?AlbumItem . ?musicianItem rdfs:label ?musician . FILTER NOT EXISTS { ?bandItem a musica:Band . ?bandItem musica:bandHaAlbum ?AlbumItem . } BIND(?musician AS ?Owner) OPTIONAL {?CertificateItem rdfs:label ?Certificate . ?AlbumItem musica:haCertificato ?CertificateItem .} { ?AlbumItem musica:numeroVendite ?Sales. } OPTIONAL { ?AlbumItem musica:dataUscita ?Out_Date. } } }
free.songs: SELECT ?Song (group_concat(?Writer; separator=", ") as ?Writers) ?Album WHERE { ?AlbumItem a musica:Album. OPTIONAL {?AlbumItem musica:contiene ?SongItem .} OPTIONAL {?SongItem musica:scrittoDa ?Writer .} ?AlbumItem rdfs:label ?Album. ?SongItem rdfs:label ?Song } GROUP BY ?Album ?Song
free.genres: SELECT ?Genre (COUNT(?Song) AS ?Songs) WHERE { ?Genre a musica:GenereMusicale. ?Song musica:haGenere ?Genre. } GROUP BY ?Genre
free.events: SELECT ?Event ?Host ?City ?Nation ?Continent WHERE {?Host musica:ospiteDi ?EventItem. ?EventItem musica:situatoIn ?City. ?City musica:situatoIn ?Nation. ?Nation musica:situatoIn ?Continent. ?EventItem rdfs:label ?Event}
free.companies: SELECT ?Music_Label ?Musician ?Producer WHERE { ?Music_Label_Item musica:haIngaggiato ?Musician. ?Musician a musica:Musicista. OPTIONAL { ?Music_Label_Item musica:haIngaggiato ?Producer. ?Producer a musica:Produttore. ?Music_Label_Item rdfs:label ?Music_Label.} }

parametrized.musicians: SELECT ?Musician ?Age (group_concat(?SubClass; separator=", ") as ?Type) ?Band WHERE {{ ?MusicianItem a ?SubClass. ?MusicianItem rdfs:label ?Musician. OPTIONAL {{ ?MusicianItem musica:et\u00E0 ?Age . }} OPTIONAL {{?BandItem rdfs:label ?Band. ?BandItem musica:haComponente ?MusicianItem .}} FILTER(REGEX(?Musician, '^{}.*', 'i') && ?SubClass != musica:Musicista && EXISTS{{ ?SubClass rdfs:subClassOf musica:Musicista}})}} group by ?MusicianItem ?Age ?BandItem
parametrized.songs: SELECT ?Song (group_concat(?Writer; separator=", ") as ?Writers) ?Album WHERE {{ ?AlbumItem a musica:Album. OPTIONAL {{?AlbumItem musica:contiene ?SongItem .}} OPTIONAL {{?SongItem musica:scrittoDa ?Writer .}} ?AlbumItem rdfs:label ?Album. ?SongItem rdfs:label ?Song. FILTER(REGEX(?Song, '^{}.*', 'i'))}} GROUP BY ?Album ?Song
parametrized.genres: SELECT ?Genre (COUNT(?Song) AS ?Songs) WHERE {{?GenreItem rdfs:label ?Genre. ?GenreItem a musica:GenereMusicale. ?Song musica:haGenere ?GenreItem. FILTER(REGEX(?Genre, '^{}.*', 'i'))}} GROUP BY ?GenreItem
parametrized.events: SELECT ?Event ?Host ?City ?Nation ?Continent WHERE {{?Host musica:ospiteDi ?EventItem. ?EventItem musica:situatoIn ?City. ?City musica:situatoIn ?Nation. ?Nation musica:situatoIn ?Continent. ?EventItem rdfs:label ?Event. FILTER(REGEX(?Event, '^{}.*', 'i'))}}
parametrized.companies: SELECT ?Music_Label ?Musician ?Producer WHERE {{FILTER(REGEX(?Music_Label, '^{}.*', 'i')) ?Music_Label_Item musica:haIngaggiato ?Musician. ?Musician a musica:Musicista. OPTIONAL {{ ?Music_Label_Item musica:haIngaggiato ?Producer. ?Producer a musica:Produttore. ?Music_Label_Item rdfs:label ?Music_Label.}} }}
